summary: Improves the faces and changes a few outfits for 111 Vanilla NPCs. 10 Dawnguard, and 7 Hearthfire, DB NPCs in the works.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=36pt][FONT=Book Antiqua][u]Faces of Skyrim[/u][/FONT][/size][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a124/Artemas13/Steam/NjadaandRia.jpg[/IMG][/center]

Some of the NPCs in Skyrim were so homely they looked downright malformed. Garthar for example looked like a frost troll had stomped on his face when he was a baby. So I went about fixing them. I updated facial geometry, eyes, noses, brows, whatever I could to make these NPCs look a bit better (some look a [i]great[/i] deal better). Some folks got baths, some got new threads, some both. Warpaint has been added or changed on a handful of people.

The facial age on a number of players was changed to either better match their voices or because I thought they looked far too old or young, however, a few I made younger just because. :)

[color=green][b]The list of updated characters is in the readme and currently includes 111 NPCs[/b][/color] I originally had only set out to do a handful of NPCs but got carried away. :)

Faces of Skyrim now includes NPCs from Hearthfire and Dawnguard, Dragonborn will be done at a later date (Need to play that bit some more first).

[center][IMG]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a124/Artemas13/Steam/Border2.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[b][u]These are the body and face mods I am using (NOTE: body mods are adult). None are required to use Faces of Skyrim but they will certainly help the end result:[/u][/b]

[b]Females:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url] by navetsea

[b]Males:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles[/url] by Chris57 and FavoredSoul

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url] by Xenius

[b]Hair:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4307]AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male[/url] - by AnOldFriend

[b]Brows:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25825]Better Eyebrow Options - non-replacers[/url] by Regn

[b]Eyes:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498]High Quality Eyes[/url] by Xenius

[center][IMG]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a124/Artemas13/Steam/Border2.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[b][u]Check out my other mods:[/u][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31567]Vlindrel Hall Reborn[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21374]Understone Keep Fountains and Rubble[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6398]Darker Wolf Armor[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32359]Simply Improved Breezehome[/url]

[center][IMG]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a124/Artemas13/Steam/Border2.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[b][u]Changelog:[/u][/b]

02/18/2013: v1 released

06/17/2013: v1.1 released

Fixes file directory folder name error (causing gray-face). Added one NPC improvement.

06/23/2013: v1.2 released

This should be the final for the vanilla NPCs, now improves 111 NPCs.

01/17/2014: Dawnguard and Hearthfire released (v1.2)

Small optional mods that update 7 Hearthfire NPCs and 10 Dawnguard
author: Venatoris
